p: For antimicrobial tests: Mueller Hinton agar and potato dextrose agar (PDA) were purchased from Bio-Rad (Bio-Rad, France). For the wounds healing evaluation: Balance rocking, scissors, razor blade, knife blade, pliers, cotton, syringe, beaker, spatula, “Cicaflora ®”, physiological serum, HCl (2%) and ether were used too.
